Package me.marcosassuncao.servsim.server

Class ServerHourlyAvailability

java.lang.Object
me.marcosassuncao.servsim.server.ServerHourlyAvailability
All Implemented Interfaces:
ServerAvailability
public class ServerHourlyAvailability extends Object implements ServerAvailability
This class implements the information about the resource availability. It defines the percentage of resources that should be available at a given moment, and when will be the next event change.

NOTE: By default, this availability object assumes that all resources should be available during the whole simulation time. This class allows one to set the availability of resources over a week at a granularity of one hour.

Author:
Marcos Dias de Assuncao

    • setAvailability

      public void setAvailability(int dStart, int hStart, int dEnd, int hEnd, float av)
      Sets the availability during a given period.
      Parameters:
      dStart - the start day of the week (between Calendar.SUNDAY and Calendar.SATURDAY).
      hStart - the start our of the day (between 0 and 23)
      dEnd - the end day of the week (between Calendar.SUNDAY and Calendar.SATURDAY).
      hEnd - the end our of the day (between 0 and 23)
      av - the availability (between 0 and 1
      See Also:
      • Calendar.SUNDAY
      • Calendar.MONDAY
      • Calendar.TUESDAY
      • Calendar.WEDNESDAY
      • Calendar.THURSDAY
      • Calendar.FRIDAY
      • Calendar.SATURDAY

    • getAvailability

      public float getAvailability(int weekDay, int hour)
      Returns the availability at the week day and hour.
      Parameters:
      weekDay - the day of the week, such that Calendar.SUNDAY >= weekDay <= Calendar.SATURDAY
      hour - hour of the day, from 0 to 23
      Returns:
      a value between (0 and 1) representing the availability
